sentences.english: The mission of this army colonel and his two fellow taikonauts will last about 40 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这位上校和他的两位航天员伙伴持续40分钟的任务。

sentences.english: Itwas used in 1961 during the flight ofastronauntastronaut Alan Shepard.
sentences.chinese: 在1961年航天员阿郎斯巴达曾使用过。

sentences.english: Important Role of Medical Helicopter in Rescue for Astronaut in the Landing Place .
sentences.chinese: 医疗救护直升机在航天员医疗保障中所起的重要作用。

sentences.english: Then the astronauts extravehicular activity of the most important risk is that what?
sentences.chinese: 那么航天员出舱活动最主要的风险是什么？

sentences.english: Three minifigures are included: one male and one female astronaut as well as a service crew member.
sentences.chinese: 整套模型还有一男一女两名航天员及一个地勤人员。

sentences.english: Well, the first Chinese astronaut extravehicular activities, what the risks are?
sentences.chinese: 那么中国航天员首次出舱活动会有哪些风险？

sentences.english: Many scientists want to make contact with spacemen .
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家想要和航天员接触。

sentences.english: Five astronauts are carried in the spaceship.
sentences.chinese: 载这架航天飞机的有五名航天员。

sentences.english: Space exploration activities would be incomplete without participation of female astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 没有女性航天员的参与，空间探索活动是不完整的。

sentences.english: The astronaut shoots the water into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 对航天员的外围投篮水入他的嘴里。

sentences.english: Zhai Zhigang is the first Chinese astronaut to walk in the outer space.
sentences.chinese: 翟志刚是第一个在外太空行走的中国航天员。

sentences.english: A pair of Chinese astronauts have returned from a month-long stay aboard the country's space station.
sentences.chinese: 两名中国航天员在太空站上呆一个月后安全返回。

sentences.english: Sword 10 years, this year, "the seven gods" to launch, Zhai Zhigang become astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 十年磨一剑，今年“神七”发射，翟志刚成为航天员。

sentences.english: Since 2003, China has sent a further nine taikonauts into orbit.
sentences.chinese: 自2003年以来，中国另将9名航天员送入轨道。

sentences.english: Doctors on the compound are closely monitoring the astronauts' physical and psychological states, she said.
sentences.chinese: 场地医生在严密监控航天员的身心状态。

definition: Yang Liwei (1965-), astronaut, first Chinese citizen in space
Yuri Gagarin (1934-1968), Russian cosmonaut, first human in space
moon landing/to land on the moon
